EmailTemplate.subject: Your appearance in the under 40 special section of Fortune magazine
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
You have an exclusive opportunity to appear in one of the most respected media brands in the nation – Fortune magazine! Five Star award winners, under the age of 40, will be recognized in a special section of the February/March 2023 issue..
Benefits of participating, include:
1) Leveraging your personal brand with one of the most-respected media brands in the nation. Your friends, family and clients alike, throughout the entire country, will be able to see you in Fortune!
2) 100 physical reprints, an electronic reprint, and a copy of the magazine highlighting your appearance. These are a very impactful at new client presentations and with your current and past clients to gain referrals!
3) An announcement letter highlighting your appearance. Share this letter with your client and professional network for expanded exposure of your Fortune appearance.
Millennials’ assets are projected to grow from $1.4 trillion in 2015 to $11.3 trillion in 2030. Given your unique position, as a Five Star award winner and as someone who is part of the younger generation, you are uniquely positioned to connect with this growing, affluent group.
This is an exclusive offer. Please call my direct line today or you can use the link below to schedule a short 15-minute conversation with me. The section is limited to wealth managers under 40.
{!Contact.AM_Follow_Up_Link__c}
I look forward to hearing from you!
Regards,
{!Contact.OwnerFullName}
Account Manager
Five Star Professional
